name: Purchasing
description: The process of acquiring necessary items and equipment for the vessel's operations and maintenance.

name: Provision Bunker
description: The supply of fuel and provisions, such as food and other necessities, for the crew and the vessel.

name: Chipping and Painting
description: The maintenance task of removing rust and old paint from the shipâ€™s surface and applying a new coat to protect the vessel.

name: Garbage
description: The handling and proper disposal of waste generated onboard during the vessel's operation.

name: Cleaner
description: A worker or product used for cleaning different areas of the vessel, ensuring hygienic conditions.

name: Contractor and General Suppliers
description: Suppliers and contractors providing various goods, services, and repairs to ensure the smooth operation of the vessel.
